name: TEV site
description: Cleavage tag for the TEV protease (cleaves between Gln and Ser)

name: ALFA-tag
description: Helical peptide tag for recognition by a repertoire of antibodies

name: AviTag
description: For biotinylation by BirA and streptavidin isolation

name: TC tag
description: Recognized by FlAsH and ReAsH biarsenical compounds

name: Thrombin site
description: For thrombin (cleaves between Arg and Gly)

name: PreScission site
description: For PreScission protease (cleaves between Gln and Gly)

name: TAP
description: Tandem affinity purification (TAP) combination tag: calmodulin binding peptide (CBP), TEV site, and two ProtA IgG-binding domains

name: HiBiT
description: Binds to LgBiT. The complex has luciferase activity.
